cards.rules_text: Target creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“A snake bite? A prayer to Pharika. A broken bone? Another prayer to the Snake-Twined. These weak fools pray because they're too afraid of having real responsibility.”
—Camilla[/i]

—Basilo, Lion of Valor[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]An entrancing melody brought Pero to the world of the living, only for the Bleak-Hearted to twist his body into a servant fitting a god of the dead.[/i]

cards.flavor_text:

—Orestes, Heroic Scoundrel[/i]

Koios
As his god was torn asunder, Koios questioned his entire world, from Theros to Claes. How small was everything in a multiverse so vast?
